action.action-desc: Mr. Gimenez (for himself, Ms. Wilson of Florida, Mr. Young, Ms. Salazar, Mr. Peters, Mr. Mast, and Mrs. Murphy of Florida) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 46, United States Code, to make certain improvements to the project selection criteria for grants under the port and intermodal improvement program, and for other purposes.

subsection.text: Section 54301(a)(6)(A)(i) of title 46, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking movement of goods through a port or intermodal connection to a port and inserting movement of—; and
by adding at the end the following new subclauses:

subclause.text: goods through a port or intermodal connection to a port; or
passengers through an emission mitigation measure under paragraph (3)(A)(ii)(IV) that provides for the use of shore power for vessels to which sections 3507 and 3508 apply.

subsection.text: Section 3513 of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2022 (Public Law 117–81) is amended by striking subsection (c).
